title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 08 December 2014 - XWiki
content:

16:01 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
16:03 <momomomomo> has quit  
16:05 <gdelhumeau> I am adding exlcudes in xwiki-platform-core/pom.xml, but maven still complains about some changes in my LESS module  
16:05 <gdelhumeau> I am adding:  
16:05 <gdelhumeau>               <differenceType>7012</differenceType>  
16:05 <gdelhumeau>               <className>org/xwiki/lesscss/LESSCache</className>  
16:05 <gdelhumeau>               <method>void clearFromEntity(org.xwiki.model.reference.EntityReference)</method>  
16:05 <gdelhumeau>               <justification>Unstable API, add support for Entity containing LESS code (eg. SSX objects).</justification>  
16:05 <gdelhumeau>             </difference>  
16:05 <gdelhumeau> and I get: [ERROR] 7012: org.xwiki.lesscss.LESSCache: Method 'public void clearFromEntity(org.xwiki.model.reference.EntityReference)' has been added to an interface  
16:06 <gdelhumeau> any idea?  
16:09 <AFKGeek> has quit  
16:14 <ClemensR> gdelhumeau: is there a 'public' in front of the ' void clearFromEntity' in LESSCache.java ?  
16:14 <gdelhumeau> no, because it is an interface  
16:15 <gdelhumeau> I have tried to add "public" in the <difference>, but it still does not work  
16:16 <ClemensR> ah, ok, then I have no idea either :(  
16:19 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
16:27 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: looks goood and no you don't need "public"  
16:27 <momomomomo> has quit  
16:30 <gdelhumeau> then I don't understand  
16:30 <gdelhumeau> it is blocking me  
16:37 <vmassol> have you tried building the platform core pom?  
16:37 <vmassol> using -N  
16:37 <vmassol> mvn clean install -N in xwiki-platform-core  
16:37 <vmassol> and then you rebuild your modile  
16:37 <vmassol> \*module  
16:37 <vmassol> (gdelhumeau)  
16:40 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: still does not work  
16:44 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I don't know, maybe show us your pom.xml where the clirr exclusion is located  
16:44 <vmassol> maybe it's some stupid unknown charaacter somewhere  
16:44 <gdelhumeau> http://hastebin.com/agidozihip.xml  
16:45 <gdelhumeau> line 441  
16:45 <vmassol> so there other exclusions you added work?  
16:45 <gdelhumeau> note that I have first tried to add some excludes in the line 465, and I had the same pb  
16:45 <gdelhumeau> none of the 3 concerning LESS  
16:46 <gdelhumeau> is it because I have forgotten to put  @Unstable to the interface?  
16:46 <vmassol> no  
16:46 <vmassol> clirr doesn't use that  
16:50 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <gdelhumeau> then it's buggy  
16:56 <momomomomo> has quit  
16:58 <vmassol> so line 452 works?  
16:58 <vmassol> (and 458)  
16:58 <vmassol> (gdelhumeau)  
16:58 <vmassol> they're pretty similar  
16:59 <gdelhumeau> no  
16:59 <gdelhumeau> line 464 works  
17:00 <gdelhumeau> but none those concern LESS  
17:00 <vmassol> I don't understand  
17:01 <vmassol> can you show me the exact result you get?  
17:01 <vmassol> the result you get with http://hastebin.com/agidozihip.xml  
17:02 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:02 <vmassol> (gdelhumeau)  
17:03 <gdelhumeau> http://hastebin.com/vuvideqovu.vhdl  
17:06 <vmassol> btw  
17:06 <vmassol> [WARNING] /home/gdelhumeau/xwiki/xwiki-platform/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-lesscss/xwiki-platform-lesscss-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/lesscss/LESSCompilerException.java:[28,8] serializable class org.xwiki.lesscss.LESSCompilerException has no definition of serialVersionUID  
17:08 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: you could commit and we would be able to test if we have the same problem  
17:08 <gdelhumeau> ok  
17:09 <momomomomo> has joined #xwiki  
17:11 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: done  
17:11 <gdelhumeau> let see what jenkins will say  
17:11 <vmassol> tryin  
17:13 <vmassol> fails here
